BOOK.Name: Γένεσις
BOOK.Intro: A reading from Genesis

BOOK.Name: Ἔξοδος
BOOK.Intro: A reading from Exodus
BOOK.Note: There seems to ba issues with the versification of Chapters 37 to end.

BOOK.Name: Λευϊτικόν
BOOK.Intro: A reading from Levites

BOOK.Name: Ἀριθμοί
BOOK.Intro: A reading from Numbers

BOOK.Name: Δευτερονόμιον
BOOK.Intro: A reading Deuteronomy

BOOK.Name: Ἰησοῦς Nαυῆ
BOOK.Intro: A reading from Joshua, the son of Nun
BOOK.Note: Issue with Chapter 12, Verses 18-22, Different set of kings listed in different versions, issues with the number of verses in the final chapter

BOOK.Name: Κριταί
BOOK.Intro: A reading from Judges

BOOK.Name: Ῥούθ
BOOK.Intro: A reading from Ruth

BOOK.Name: Βασιλειῶν Α'
BOOK.Intro: A reading from the first Book of Kingdoms

BOOK.Name: Βασιλειῶν Β'
BOOK.Intro: A reading from the second Book of Kingdoms

BOOK.Name: Βασιλειῶν Γ'
BOOK.Intro: A reading from the third Book of Kingdoms
BOOK.Note: There are versification issues here, especially Chapters 6, 11.

BOOK.Name: Βασιλειῶν Δ'
BOOK.Intro: A reading from the fourth Book of Kingdoms

BOOK.Name: Παραλειπομένων Α'
BOOK.Intro: A reading from the first Book of Paralipomenon

BOOK.Name: Παραλειπομένων Β'
BOOK.Intro: A reading from the second Book of Paraliponmenon
BOOK.Note: There are versification issues with Chapters 35 and 36.

BOOK.Name: Ἔσδρας Αʹ
BOOK.Intro: A reading from the second Book of Esdras
BOOK.Note: In LXX, Esdras A' corresponds to the Slavonic (and other) Esdras II.

BOOK.Name: Ἔσδρας Βʹ
BOOK.Intro: A reading from the first Book of Esdras
BOOK.Note: In LXX, Esdras B' corresponds to the Slavonic (and other) Esdras I (Chapters 1 to 10) and Nehemiah (Chapter 11 to end).

BOOK.Name: Νεεμίας
BOOK.Intro: A reading from the Prophecy of Nehemiah

BOOK.Name: Τωβίτ
BOOK.Intro: A reading from Tobit

BOOK.Name: Ἰουδίθ
BOOK.Intro: A reading from Judith

BOOK.Name: Ἐσθήρ
BOOK.Intro: A reading from Esther

BOOK.Name: Ἰώβ
BOOK.Intro: A reading from the Job

BOOK.Name: Ψαλμοί
BOOK.Intro: Ψαλμοί

BOOK.Name: Παροιμίαι
BOOK.Intro: A reading from Proverbs
BOOK.Notes: Chapters 16, 19, 24 need to be checked for versification, as well the number of chapters is different from all other versions!

BOOK.Name: Ἐκκλησιαστής
BOOK.Intro: A reading from Ecclesiastes

BOOK.Name: Ἆσμα Ἀσμάτων
